==Translingual==

===Etymology===
Coined in Japan ([[kokuji]]) in late 1700s - early 1800s by ''[[rangaku]]'' scholar Udagawa Genshin as a translation for {{cog|nl|klier||gland}}, as a compound of {{cog|zhx}} elements {{Han compound|肉|泉}}.

===Han character===
